results.title: 11 Ways To Say 'How Are You?' In German - Emma Loves German
results.content: Wiegehtesdir? is the informal version, so you can use this on anyone you would normally speak informally with; friends, family, younger people etc. How to Respond If someone asks youwiegehtesdir? the correct way to respond would be to say: ... Top tip: Note that when asking 'how are you?' in German, the pronoun is in the dative case ...

results.title: How To Say How Are You In German (And Respond)
results.content: Learn different ways to ask and answer how someone is in German, from informal to formal situations. Find out how to usewiegeht's,wiegehtesdir, alles gut, was macht die Arbeit and more.

results.title: How to Use Wie Geht's and How to Respond - Discover Discomfort
results.content: Wiegeht's, which means how are you in German, is a commonly used expression. Learn how to use it correctly and the different ways you can respond.

results.title: How Are You In German: 10 Simple Ways To Say It + Examples
results.content: Learn how to ask and answer "How are you?" in German with different phrases for formal and informal situations. See examples of real-life conversations and alternative expressions for "Wiegehtesdir?"

results.title: Best Ways to Respond to Wie geht es dir - speakawesomely.com
results.content: Responding toWiegehtesdirgoes beyond grammar—it's about building cultural bridges. Learn more and speak awesomely.
